modName: Narrowed thinner glass blades transparent glass compatible
summary: Small mesh edits to narrow glass blades.
descriptionHtml:
Turns your glass spatulaS into a real swordS!
No offense Beth. I really love glass stuff, but the blades shapes are really too wide for me.
Note that the blood splatter area is adapted to the new shape.

Sword, dagger and greatsword edited, with transparent glass versions too. See screenshots for details ;)  TEXTURES ARE NOT INCLUDED

EDIT : incorrect blood splatter area on the dagger fixed!


Install/Uninstal:

Put glasssword.nif and 1stpersonglasssword.nif into Skyrim/Data/Meshes/Weapons/Glass to replace the regular glass sword.
Do the same with glasssword_chillrend named files to replace Chillrend, as it has its own mesh.
Of course, you can replace both or only one.
Same for other meshes

To uninstall, just delete these files.


Partly inspired by Narrow Bladed Elven Longsword Replacer (http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2902).
Made using Nifskope and 3dsMax.

You can use the files as you wish, just credit me :)

I used some properties of meshes edited by foxey here : http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2921
Thanks for sharing!
author: Garibanth
